>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.cA0NuGh484BwlDjX]{Drone}

You can choose from any of the mods on the advanced mod list whenever your drone gains a new mod (in addition to those from the basic mod list). Your drone must always have at least 5 mods from the basic list before you can add any advanced mods, even if you rebuild your drone after it gains this ability.
